PS description: ATK & DEF +80%; plus an additional DEF +10% with each Super Attack performed (up to 30%); Terrifying Conquerors Category allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF +30%

LS description: DB Saga Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +50%
SA description: Raises ATK for 1 turn  <Raises  by 30% for 1 turn>   and causes supreme damage to enemy
PS description: ATK & DEF +150%; plus an additional ATK & DEF +100% when performing a Super Attack; Super Class allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF +20%; plus an additional DEF +100% and starting from the 5th turn, launches an additional attack that has a high chance  <50% chance for additional attack to become a Super Attack>   of becoming a Super Attack and Super Class allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF +20% in addition when there is a Peppy Gals Category ally on the team

LS description: Movie Heroes or Artificial Life Forms Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%;plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the Accelerated Battle or Worthy Rivals Category
SA description: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn  <Raises  and DEF by 30% for 1 turn>   and causes immense damage to enemy
PS description: Activates the Entrance Animation upon entry (once only), ATK +50% and guards all attacks for 4 turns from start of turn; ATK & DEF +150%; plus an additional ATK +100% when performing a Super Attack; plus an additional ATK & DEF +20% (up to 100%) and reduces damage received by 10% (up to 50%) with each attack received; medium chance  <30% chance of performing a critical hit>   of performing a critical hit for the rest of battle starting from the turn in which the character receives an attack 5 or more times during battle; all allies' Ki +1 and DEF +30%; great chance  <70% chance of evading and countering enemy's Unarmed Super Attack>   of evading enemy's Unarmed Super Attack and countering with tremendous power

LS description: Movie Heroes, Androids or Special Pose Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%;plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the Accelerated Battle or Worthy Rivals Category
SA description: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn  <Raises  and DEF by 30% for 1 turn>   and causes immense damage to enemy
PS description: Activates the Entrance Animation upon entry (once only), DEF +50% and launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a medium chance  <30% chance for each additional attack to become a Super Attack>   of becoming a Super Attack for 4 turns from start of turn; ATK & DEF +150%; plus an additional ATK +100% when performing a Super Attack; plus an additional ATK & DEF +20% (up to 100%) and chance of performing a critical hit 10% (up to 50%) with each attack performed; launches an additional attack that has a great chance  <70% chance for additional attack to become a Super Attack>   of becoming a Super Attack starting from the turn in which the character performs the 5th attack in battle; all allies' Ki +2 and ATK +30%; high chance  <50% chance to nullify enemy's Ki Blast Super Attack>   of nullifying Ki Blast Super Attacks directed at the character
